text: 18|110|(napiye!) Kuruviraka: ‘‘Niccayamaka nanum unkalaip ponra oru manitantan. Niccayamaka unkal iraivan ore or iraivantan enru enakku vahyi mulam arivikkappattullatu. Akave, evar tan iraivanaic cantikka virumpukiraro avar narceyalkalaic ceytu tan iraivanukku oruvaraiyum inaiyakkatu (avanaiye) vananki varuvaraka
